panels.title: Number of threads and processes running

targets.expr: sum by(pod, container, node) (container_memory_cache{container="$container_name", pod="$pod_name", node="$node", image!=""})
max by(pod, container, node) (container_memory_kernel_usage{container="$container_name", pod="$pod_name", node="$node", image!=""})
max by(pod, container, node) (container_memory_mapped_file{container="$container_name", pod="$pod_name", node="$node", image!=""})
max by(pod, container, node) (container_memory_max_usage_bytes{container="$container_name", pod="$pod_name", node="$node", image!=""})
max by(pod, container, node) (container_memory_rss{container="$container_name", pod="$pod_name", node="$node", image!=""})
avg by(pod, container, node) (container_memory_swap{container="$container_name", pod="$pod_name", node="$node", image!=""})
avg by(pod, container, node) (container_memory_usage_bytes{container="$container_name", pod="$pod_name", node="$node", image!=""})
avg by(pod, container, node) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{container="$container_name", pod="$pod_name", node="$node", image!=""})
avg by(container, pod, node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace=~"$namespace", pod!="", container!=""})
sum by(container, pod, node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod!="", container!=""})
sum by(container, pod, node) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod!="", container!=""})
sum by(container, pod, node) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace=~"$namespace", pod!="", container!=""})
